entry.title: Friday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or showers. Drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
